TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SinglePhaseEnlistment extends System.Transactions.Enlistment

Docs.summary: Provides a set of callbacks that facilitate communication between a participant enlisted for Single Phase Commit and the transaction manager when the notification is received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When a resource manager's implementation of <xref:System.Transactions.ISinglePhaseNotification.SinglePhaseCommit%2A> is called, and an instance of this type is passsed in, the participant then notifies the transaction manager via the <xref:System.Transactions.SinglePhaseEnlistment.Committed%2A> method or the <xref:System.Transactions.SinglePhaseEnlistment.Aborted%2A> method to indicate whether the transaction should be committed or rolled back.

Docs.summary: Represents a callback that is used to indicate to the transaction manager that the transaction should be rolled back.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A transaction participant uses this method to notify the transaction manager that the transaction should be rolled back.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Aborted() cil managed

Docs.summary: Represents a callback that is used to indicate to the transaction manager that the transaction should be rolled back.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A transaction participant implementing the <xref:System.Transactions.ISinglePhaseNotification> interface uses this method to notify the transaction manager that it cannot commit, and that the transaction should be rolled back.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Aborted(class System.Exception e) cil managed

Docs.param: An explanation of why a rollback is initiated.
Docs.summary: Represents a callback that is used to indicate to the transaction manager that the transaction should be rolled back, and provides an explanation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Committed() cil managed

Docs.summary: Represents a callback that is used to indicate to the transaction manager that the SinglePhaseCommit was successful.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A transaction participant implementing the <xref:System.Transactions.ISinglePhaseNotification> interface uses this method to notify the transaction manager that the transaction should be committed.

Docs.summary: Represents a callback that is used to indicate to the transaction manager that the status of the transaction is in doubt.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A transaction participant implementing the <xref:System.Transactions.ISinglePhaseNotification> interface uses this method to notify the transaction manager that the transaction is in doubt. A transaction is in doubt when one or more of the enlisted resource managers cannot be contacted.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void InDoubt(class System.Exception e) cil managed

Docs.param: An explanation of why the transaction is in doubt.
Docs.summary: Represents a callback that is used to indicate to the transaction manager that the status of the transaction is in doubt, and provides an explanation.
